    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddonLoader
     
    ArgUtils
    Registration shortcuts for string to ArgumentType mappings.
    AssetStoreUtils
    Quick utility methods for working with AssetStore
    Block
    Represents a block in a world.
    BlockContext
    Represents a TriggerContext which includes a Block
    CancellableContext
    Represents a TriggerContext for an event that can be canceled.
    CommandArg
    Represents a command argument which contains a name, argument type, description, and optional flag.
    Direction
    Represents a direction.
    EntityUtils
    Quick utility class for accessing entity components.
    ErrorHandler
     
    FileUtils
    Utilities for working with files.
    HySk
    Main class for HySkript as a Hytale plugin.
    HySkriptAddon
    Base class for addons for HySkript.
    JsonDocPrinter
     
    JsonVariableStorage
    Instance of VariableStorage that stores variables in a JSON file.
    JsonVariableStorage.Type
     
    Manifest
     
    MarkdownDocPrinter
    Documentation printer.
    NPCRegistry
    Registry holder for NPC Roles.
    NPCRegistry.NPCRole
     
    PlayerContext
    Represents a TriggerContext which includes a Player
    PlayerRefContext
    Represents a TriggerContext which includes a PlayerRef
    PlayerUtils
    Utilities for Players
    ReflectionUtils
    Utilities for reflection operations.
    ScriptCommandBuilder
    Builder for Script Commands.
    ScriptCommandParent
     
    ScriptsLoader
     
    SerializerUtils
    Utilities for serializers.
    Skript
    Main class for the Skript aspects of HySkript.
    SkriptConfig
    Config for Skript
    SkriptRegistration
    An extension of SkriptRegistration with additional features.
    SkriptRegistration.AssetStoreType<C,K>
     
    SkriptRegistration.EnumType<E>
     
    StoreUtils
     
    SystemEvent<S>
    A SkriptEvent that is handled by a Hytale ISystem
    Utils
    Utility class for quick method usage.
